symptoms.name: Superior vena cava syndrome
symptoms.pattern: Can be present if tumor compresses the superior vena cava

symptoms.name: Dysphagia
symptoms.pattern: Can be present if tumor compresses the esophagus

symptoms.name: Horner's syndrome
symptoms.pattern: Can be present if tumor affects the sympathetic nerves

imaging_findings.CT scan: Can provide detailed images of the mass and surrounding structures
imaging_findings.MRI: Can provide detailed images of the mass and surrounding structures

required: Imaging evidence of a mass in the anterior mediastinum
supportive: Symptoms suggestive of anterior mediastinal mass compression
